DigitalNumericConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant»NumericConstant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Display FormatReturns a cluster that describes the Format and Precision of the numeric object. Details
Display Format:FormatReturns the format of the numeric object, which is a number that corresponds to the values in the following section. Details
Display Format:PrecisionReturns the number of digits after the decimal point. Details
Format StringGets and sets the format code of the object. Details
Numeric TextReturns a reference to the numeric text in the constant. Details
Radix Visible?Specifies whether the radix is visible. Details
Unit LabelReturns a reference to the unit label of the object. Details
